hero.title: Hello, I'm Rômulo Oliveira
hero.text: +4 years of experience. Software Developer from Fortaleza, Brazil. Specialized in web technology development.

experiences.title: Backend Developer
experiences.description: Backend development in fiscal solutions using Ruby on Rails. Development and maintenance of integrated systems for various municipalities, optimizing the management of municipal taxes. My work involves implementing new features, bug fixes, and continuous improvements. In addition, I collaborate with the team to ensure the efficiency and scalability of the applications.
experiences.techs: Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, Docker, Git, BitBucket.

experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.description: Development and maintenance of a driver's license registration and management system for the German government. Actively contributed to the design, development, and continuous refinement of innovative solutions for the project. My tasks also include code reviews, testing, and creating detailed documentation to ensure quality and usability.
experiences.techs: Typescript, Javascript, Vue.js, Bulma, C#, .NET, Docker, Kubernetes.

experiences.title: Stark Software
experiences.description: Developed projects using modern web technologies and techniques, including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, PHP, and Ruby. Responsible for API integration, and development and maintenance of complete systems made in Laravel and Ruby on Rails, and worked on SaaS systems, using Next.js. Also performed code reviews to ensure product quality and applied agile methodologies in the projects I developed.
experiences.techs: Javascript, Typescript, Ruby, PHP, Ruby on Rails, Laravel, Next.js, Nuxt.js, Tailwind, Typescript, Mysql, PostgreSQL, SQlite, Docker, AWS, Git, Gitlab, Github.

projects.title: Marvel Snap Brasil - Brazilian Marvel Snap Portal

about.title: About me
about.text_01: My name is Rômulo Oliveira and I started my programming career in 2020. Since then, I have been specializing in web technology development, focusing on both back-end and front-end.
about.text_02: I am responsible for the development of Marvel Snap Brasil, a Brazilian portal for the Marvel Snap card game. Additionally, I have experience in developing personal financial control systems, service scheduling systems, and real-time chat systems.
about.text_03: I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow professionally. My goal is to contribute to innovative and challenging projects where I can apply my knowledge and skills to create efficient and high-quality solutions.
